org.apache.solr.util

Class RTimerTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.util.RTimer
      • org.apache.solr.util.RTimerTree

  • public class RTimerTree
extends RTimer
    A recursive timer. RTimerTree's are started automatically when instantiated; sub-timers are also started automatically when created.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.solr.util.RTimer
